txt.en: 'Have you heard what the guild is charging for sheep? How much can it cost to drive them over from Buckland?'
'All those high poppies in the Upper City think they know everything, looking down their noses at us regular folk.'
'I've cut three bales o' leaf this morning, and how many did that fool Goatleaf cut? Four, the whole day long!'
'I don't see any callouses on your hands. You must be one o' them historians or lore-fellows.'
